JOB DESCRIPTION: Desired Profile   :      Expertise in C / C++ and Golang programming is mandatory     Experience in developing highly- available,  carrier- class network solutions     Own one or more sub- system/module of the solution under development     Work closely with System engineers,  Validation and Operation teams for quality,  on time delivery of agreed deliverables     Strong knowledge of telecom protocols is a plus     Working knowledge on gRPC,  HTTP/REST,  SOAP is a plus     Experience working with XML/JSON encoder/decoder is a strong plus     Experience with design and implementation of microservices on Kubernetes will be a strong plus
